title: John Collier - His Monkey Wife (pdf)
description:
John Collier - His Monkey Wife or, Married to a Chimp (Oxford UP, 1983; first published 1930). Introduction by Paul Theroux. 274 pp.

Improved version of an older scan. Searchable pdf (clearscan) with contents in bookmarks, accurate pagination and metadata, etc. Many thanks to the original scanner.


description:

When Alfred Fatigay returns to his native London, he brings along his trustworthy pet chimpanzee Emily who, unbeknownst to Fatigay, has become civilized: literate, literary--and in love with Fatigay himself.
